build.code:
#!/bin/bash
# Code for task build.
#
# Persistent: true
# DependsOn:
# Vars:
#
# Please edit this file to execute the desired operation.
# Return 0 for success != 0 for fail.
# The return value determines when persistency is satifiable.

set -e

readonly ROOT=$(pwd)

# populating the directories
mkdir -p ${ROOT}/install
mkdir -p ${ROOT}/build

# configuring in the build directory
cd ${ROOT}/build
${ROOT}/sources/arc-qemu/configure --target-list=arc-softmmu --enable-debug --disable-pie --prefix=${ROOT}/install --enable-debug-tcg --enable-trace-backends=log --extra-cflags="-O0 -g3 -save-temps=obj"

# building the damn thing and installing
make -j 8
make install

exit 0

test.code:
#!/bin/bash
# Code for task test.
#
# Persistent: false
# DependsOn: build
# Vars: arcinstall
#
# Please edit this file to execute the desired operation.
# Return 0 for success != 0 for fail.
# The return value determines when persistency is satifiable.

set -e

export PATH="${arcinstall}/bin:$PATH"

readonly ROOT=$(pwd)

cd ${ROOT}/build/tests/tcg/arc
make
make check

exit 0
